title: How to View Pay Stubs on ProLiant

steps.title: Search “www.proliant.com” on a web browser.
steps.content: Search “www.proliant.com” on a web browser. You can use Google Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge, or any other web browser.

steps.title: Click “LOGIN” in the top right corner.
steps.content: Click “LOGIN” in the top right corner.

steps.title: Enter your username and password to log in.
steps.content: Enter your username and password to log in. You may be prompted to select “Employee” before rerouting to the login screen. If you are unsure of your username or password, reach out to your manager or HR department. Additional verification may be necessary; proceed as instructed by the website.

steps.title: Hover over “My Info” in the top menu bar.
steps.content: Hover over “My Info” in the top menu bar. Depending on your browser size, this menu bar may not be visible. Instead, click on the three parallel lines in the upper left corner to open a similar menu screen.

steps.title: Select "Check History" from the dropdown.
steps.content: Select "Check History" from the dropdown. The "Check History" button is under the "Paychecks & W-2" subsection.

steps.title: Choose the year for which you’d like to search.
steps.content: Choose the year for which you’d like to search. Pick via the “Select Year” dropdown near the top right corner. The dropdown will only show options for years that have been worked and have available pay stubs.

steps.title: Select the print icon on the far right of the column of the check you wish to view via the table on the screen.
steps.content: Select the print icon on the far right of the column of the check you wish to view via the table on the screen.

steps.title: Allow time to load.
steps.content: Allow time to load. A separate browser window will open. Don't worry; the program takes time to generate the digital pay stub, which may take longer than expected!

steps.title: Select the download button at the top right to save the pay stub to your computer.
steps.content: Select the download button at the top right to save the pay stub to your computer.

steps.title: Search “www.proliant.com” on a web browser.
steps.content: Search “www.proliant.com” on a web browser. You can use Google Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge, or any other web browser.

steps.title: Tap the three horizontal lines in the top right corner.
steps.content: Tap the three horizontal lines in the top right corner.

steps.title: Select "LOGIN" from the menu page.
steps.content: Select "LOGIN" from the menu page.

steps.title: Enter your username and password to log in.
steps.content: Enter your username and password to log in. You may be prompted to select "Employee" before rerouting to the login screen. If you are unsure of your username or password, contact your manager or HR department. Additional verification may be necessary; proceed as instructed by the website.

steps.title: Tap the three horizontal lines in the top left corner.
steps.content: Tap the three horizontal lines in the top left corner.

steps.title: Select "My Info" from the menu page.
steps.content: Select "My Info" from the menu page.

steps.title: Select the "Paychecks & W-2" dropdown.
steps.content: Select the "Paychecks & W-2" dropdown.

steps.title: Select "Check History" from the dropdown.
steps.content: Select "Check History" from the dropdown.

steps.title: Choose the year you'd like to search.
steps.content: Choose the year you'd like to search. Pick via the "Select Year" dropdown below the table on the screen. The dropdown will only show options for years that have been worked and have available pay stubs.

steps.title: Select the print icon on the far right of the column of the check you wish to view via the table on the screen.
steps.content: Select the print icon on the far right of the column of the check you wish to view via the table on the screen. The webpage may not fit correctly in the mobile device's browser screen, so you may have to swipe around to see all the information.

steps.title: Allow time to load.
steps.content: Allow time to load. A separate browser window will open. Don't worry; the program takes time to generate the digital pay stub, which may take longer than expected!

steps.title: Screenshot the webpage to save the pay stub to your mobile device photos.
steps.content: Screenshot the webpage to save the pay stub to your mobile device photos.
